name: Entangled Colors
description: Once upon a time, all basic digital colors RED, GREEN and BLUE, lived in harmony, until they were separated by greedy cruel forces from the underworld. Only you can help them get back together by completing a part of their journeys that include obstacle courses with peculiar quirks where, for example, you must evade rogue police patrols or flaming spikes and do puzzle-solving with doors. And all of that whilst controlling each of the characters simultaneously! To be part of the RGB revenge, try it out now!
